Content:: Kariyawasam Pathiranage Sarath Kumarasiri is a Sri Lankan politician, former provincial minister and Member of Parliament.[1] Kumarasiri was a member of Nochchiyagama Divisional Council and North Central Provincial Council where he held a provincial ministerial portfolio.[2] He contested the 2020 parliamentary election as a Sri Lanka People's Freedom Alliance electoral alliance candidate in Anuradhapura District and was elected to the Parliament of Sri Lanka.[3][4][5]  This article about a politician from North Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: K. P. S. Kumarasiri - Wikipedia
